ul.li1: 1And you will say on that day,
for though you were angry with me,
ul.li2: I will trust, and I will not be afraid,
ul.li1: for my strength and might is Yah, Yahweh;
ul.li2: and he has become salvation for me.”

chapter.p: 3And you will draw water from the wells of salvation in joy. 4And you will say on that day,

ul.li1: Make his deeds known among the peoples;
ul.li2: bring to remembrance that his name is exalted.
ul.li1: 5Sing praises to Yahweh, for he has done a glorious thing;
ul.li2: this is known in all the earth.
ul.li1: 6Inhabitant of Zion, shout out and sing for joy,
ul.li2: for the holy one of Israel is great in your midst.”
